alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 19 at 5:33AM MST until December 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches mainly north of Kooskia. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, and Greer Grade. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Monday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
